text: Arthur re-engaged his eyes with Fenchurch's once again, and then the entire planet Earth had been demolished, what was he currently standing on...? #SoLongAndThanksForAllTheFish

passages.fragment: Arthur re-engaged his eyes with Fenchurch 's once again , and
passages.source_name: So Long And Thanks For All The Fish
passages.full_quote: <used>Arthur re-engaged his eyes with Fenchurch's once again, and</used> suddenly was at a loss for something to say
After a second or so came the fanfare <used>once again, and then the</used> voice
There was a longer pause this time<used>, and then the entire</used> process was repeated once more

passages.fragment: and then the entire planet Earth had been demolished ,
passages.source_name: So Long And Thanks For All The Fish
passages.full_quote: This was the pub at which he had passed the fateful lunchtime during which first his house <used>and then the entire planet Earth had been demolished, o</used>r rather had seemed to be demolished

passages.fragment: had been demolished , what was he currently standing on ...
passages.source_name: So Long And Thanks For All The Fish
passages.full_quote: No, damn it, had been demolished, because if it hadn't then where the bloody heck had he been for the last eight years, and how he had got there if not in one of the big yellow Vogon ships which the appalling Russell had just been telling him were merely drug- induced hallucinations, and yet if it <used>had been demolished, what was he currently standing on</used>...
